metadata.title: Underway Data from the Bering Sea (1978-79)
metadata.description:
Underway physical oceanographic data were collected as part of the NOAA Pacific
Marine Environmental Laboratory's Processes and Resources of the Bering Sea
project from May 1978 to May 1979.  Parameters included in this data were temperature, salinity, chlorophyll-a, phaeopigments,  phosphate, silicate, nitrate, nitrite, carbon assimilation, pH, alkalinity, ammonia, and oxygen.
